alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 02 at 12:02PM EDT until May 04 at 10:10PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warnings continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. For the Kennebec River...including Skowhegan, North Sidney, Augusta, Hallowell...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Skowhegan. * WHEN...Until late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 80,000.0 cfs, East River Road floods to a depth of 1 to 2 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EDT Tuesday the flow was 76,000.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon and continue falling to 31,100.0 cfs Friday morning. - Flood flow is 35,000.0 cfs. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
